name: Cardinal - Chapter 1
description:
Cardinal is a tale... A tale about 4 angels who wanted to become gods. A tale which follows the path of two adventurers who decided to reveal the truth behind the tale.
Cardinal is also a world to explore. A world of floatings islands trappped into unchained elements.
A world of 3 different civilizations, forced to survive against fatality. Cardinal is a turn based RPG. Its core challenge is to properly manage your resources to survive battle and get ready for the next powerful opponents.


Main Features
  • An original tale and world to discover
  • Air and ground battles
  • One ressource to share for upgrading and fighting
  • Flexible action timeline
